phrases.text: Hey if you just joined, welcome! To play, just type : A, B, or C in the chat.
New here? It’s super simple — just type : A, B, or C in the chat to answer.
To win the game, all you need is 21 correct answers. That’s it!
First one to hit 21 points takes the win — let’s go!
just type : A, B, or C in the chat. That’s how you play.
Your screen’s waiting… give it a little love
Let’s see if we can hit 1K likes together Tap tap Guys!
Everyone who taps is officially part of the squad now
It means a lot if you tap the screen. Thanks for the support!
A simple tap = massive support for us
Every like helps us keep creating crazy stuff like this
You tapping the screen actually helps more than you think
Don't just watch—bless that screen with a little tap
If you liked this, just a tap can support the whole project
We’re growing this one tap at a time — thanks for being part of it
Jump in anytime — just type : A, B, or C in the chat to play. Let’s see what you got.
If you're enjoying the quiz, hit that share button — bring a friend in!
Know someone who’d love this? Go ahead and send them the stream.
More players, more fun — feel free to share the live!
Next question coming up — get ready to type!
Don’t overthink it — just trust your gut and answer.
You got this — it’s easier than you think!
Even if you’re not sure — take a shot! One answer could change it all.
